name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Narrow Focus: New Tab Todo List

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase your productivity by narrowing your focus to just three essential tasks for the day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Productivity with the Rule of Three

Overview
Narrow Focus is your productivity companion, designed to declutter your mind by focusing only on the three most essential tasks for the day. Say goodbye to overwhelming to-do lists and hello to laser-focused achievements. 

Features:

1. Two Sections, One Goal
Focus: Three top tasks for the day. No more, no less. Prioritize ruthlessly.
Defocus: The rest of your to-dos. Keep them here, out of sight, until they earn their place in the spotlight.

2. Streamlined New Tab Experience
Every time you open a new tab, Narrow Focus greets you with purpose. No distractions, just your essential tasks.

3. Privacy & Offline Mode
No Account Needed: No sign-up process. Your data remains yours alone.
Local Storage: All data stored locally in your browser. Work offline seamlessly.

4. Light & Dark Mode
Clean interface, minimalistic design. Your focus tasks stand tall, while the rest humbly wait their turn.

5. Daily Reset
Start fresh each day. Move yesterday's unfinished tasks to Defocus and set your sights on today's Rule of Three.

Celebrate completing your top three tasks. Witness the power of focused action.

Benefits

1. Outcomes over output
By adhering to the Rule of Three, you'll accomplish what truly matters. No more aimless busyness.

2. Reduced Decision Fatigue
Fewer choices mean less mental strain. Narrow Focus simplifies your day, leaving room for creativity.

3. Clarity Amid Chaos
When chaos knocks, your top three tasks remain steadfast. Clarity emerges from the noise.

4. Compounding effect
Completing your daily trio feels like a victory. Small wins compound into big achievements.

5. Mindful Productivity
Narrow Focus nudges you toward mindful choices. Quality over quantity, always.

Get Started
Install now and embrace the power of three. Your productivity journey begins with a single click. Remember, life's too short for endless to-do lists. Narrow your focus, broaden your impact! ðŸš€
